text: Field hockey at the 2014 Asian Games for women was held in Incheon, South Korea from 22 September to 1 October, 2014. South Korea won the tournament for the fifth time after defeating China 1–0 in the final. ==Officials== The following umpires were appointed by the FIH and AHF to officiate the tournament: * Laurine Delforge (BEL) * Megan Robertson (CAN) * Miao Lin (CHN) * Chen Mei-chen (TPE) * Claire Adenot (FRA) * Nirmla Dagar (IND) * Emi Yamada (JPN) * Amina Dyussembekova (KAZ) * Nur Hafizah Azman (MAS) * Kang Hyun-young (KOR) * Ornpimol Kittiteerasopon (THA) ==Squads== *Li Dongxiao *Wang Mengyu *Huang Ting *Xu Xiaoxu *De Jiaojiao *Cui Qiuxia *Wu Mengrong *Xi Xiayun *Peng Yang *Liang Meiyu *Wang Na *Li
